_help_posterNotAvailable: url for default poster when posterAvailable is set to false
_help_mobileQaServerPoster: url that UiServer uses to download the poster arts
_help_mobileQaServerChannelIcon: url that UiServer uses to download the channel icons
_help_baseUrl: url that points to the NDVR backoffice
_help_ndvrPort: port that points to the NDVR backoffice
_help_fullfilmentPort: port that points to the fullfilment service
_help_channelList: List of channels that CronJob to get all the available poster art
_help_storeImagesDaysFromToday: This value means that the CronJob for poster art should download images from now to n days in a future
_help_cronSchedule: Cron Job regular expresion for ImageCronjob
_help_cronEPGDownload: Cron Job regular expresion for EPGDownload
_help_cronCatchupTV: Cron Job regular expresion for Catchup Cache
_help_cronStatusFile: path of files that contains the last execution day. For EPG and Images. Clear these files is you wants to force the jobs at startup
_help_posterFolderPath: path in which the images are downloaded
_help_channelIconFolderPath: path in which the channel icons are downloaded
_help_ndvrServerEndpoint: endpoint NDVR url to schedule service
_help_ndvrRecordRefEndpoint: endpoint url to retrieve all the recording of an user
_help_ndvrRecordByIdEndPoing: endpoint url to retrieve a specific recording
_help_fullfilmentEndPoint: endpoint url to retrieve a playback session
_help_fullfilmentTsvtEndPoint: endpoint url to retrieve a playback session for tstv
_help_NDVRDeleteService: endpoint NDVR url delete a recording
_help_NDVRCancelEpisodeService: endpoint NDVR url cancel a episode
_help_NDVRCancelSeriesService: endpoint NDVR url cancel a series
_help_NDVRDeleteEpisodeService: endpoint NDVR url delete a episode
_help_NDVRDeleteSeriesService: endpoint NDVR url delete a series
_help_NDVRStopService: endpoint NDVR url stop a inprogress recording
_help_EPGTimeWindowsHours: This config is used to set the time interval on epg guide to populate the information
